about_the_game:
Mother of Monsters - GM Guide

Adapted from the 32-page Mother of Monsters GM's Guide, on the other hand, has all the spoilerrific goodies for the GM. Discover the truth behind the legends and adventure hooks to help you launch an odyssey worthy of poems and plays like those written of Jason and the Argonauts or Perseus and Medusa! Plus, more magic items and monsters to enhance your adventures!

Welcome to Kagari, a realm of war-torn island city-states, rampaging monsters, and dark cults--a place where pious people attribute their every fortune, good or bad, to the will of the gods. Its islands hold breathtaking beauty, yet hide terrible secrets within dark tombs and forbidding caves. Kagari! Where civilization exists upon the skeletons of societies long past.

This GM's resource is the companion to the Player's Guide that provides all the secrets behind the legends and lore of the Kagari Islands. Also within are new monsters and magic items unique to the realm. 

Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Warren Carlsrud
